column1: Weighted MRI image size (128, 256, 1) in T2, representing the head of a man of 37 years old, with sagittal section n°136 beginning from the right hemisphere of the skull. The image notably reveals the presence of: the brainstem of volume 901.7578 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 3407.9590 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 6135.6445 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 325.6348 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 373.0957 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1678.2715 mm³, the right thalamus proper of volume 458.7891 mm³, the right caudate nucleus of volume 118.6523 mm³, the right hippocampus of volume 6.5918 mm³, the right nucleus accumbens of volume 55.3711 mm³ and the right ventral diencephalon of volume 217.5293 mm³.
